Suppose f is Riemann integrable on [a_n,b_n] for all n. Then f is Riemann integrable on [a,b] and ‚à´_a^b f = lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} ‚à´_{a_n}^{b_n} f.

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Let f : [a,b] ‚Üí ‚Ñù be a bounded function, {a_n} and {b_n} sequences such that a < a_n < b_n < b for all n, with lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} a_n = a and lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} b_n = b. Suppose f is Riemann integrable on [a_n,b_n] for all n. Then f is Riemann integrable on [a,b] and ‚à´_a^b f = lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} ‚à´_{a_n}^{b_n} f. -/
theorem jirilebl_ra_ch_riemann_1152 {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {a b : ‚Ñù} (h_ab : a < b)
  {a‚Çô b‚Çô : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù}
  (h_seq : ‚àÄ n, a < a‚Çô n ‚àß a‚Çô n < b‚Çô n ‚àß b‚Çô n < b)
  (h_a : Tendsto a‚Çô atTop (ùìù a))
  (h_b : Tendsto b‚Çô atTop (ùìù b))
  (h_bdd : ‚àÉ M, ‚àÄ x, x ‚àà Set.Icc a b ‚Üí Real.abs (f x) ‚â§ M)
  (h_int : ‚àÄ n, IntervalIntegrable f volume (a‚Çô n) (b‚Çô n)) :
  IntervalIntegrable f volume a b ‚àß
    Tendsto (fun n => intervalIntegral f (a‚Çô n) (b‚Çô n) volume) atTop (ùìù (intervalIntegral f a b volume)) := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Let f : [a,b] ‚Üí ‚Ñù be a bounded function, {a_n} and {b_n} sequences such that a < a_n < b_n < b for all n, with lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} a_n = a and lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} b_n = b. Suppose f is Riemann integrable on [a_n,b_n] for all n. Then f is Riemann integrable on [a,b] and ‚à´_a^b f = lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} ‚à´_{a_n}^{b_n} f. -/
theorem jirilebl_ra_ch_riemann_1152 {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {a b : ‚Ñù} (h_ab : a < b)
  {a‚Çô b‚Çô : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù}
  (h_seq : ‚àÄ n, a < a‚Çô n ‚àß a‚Çô n < b‚Çô n ‚àß b‚Çô n < b)
  (h_a : Tendsto (fun n => a‚Çô n) atTop (ùìù a))
  (h_b : Tendsto (fun n => b‚Çô n) atTop (ùìù b))
  (h_bdd : ‚àÉ M, ‚àÄ x, x ‚àà Set.Icc a b ‚Üí abs (f x) ‚â§ M)
  (h_int : ‚àÄ n, IntervalIntegrable f volume (a‚Çô n) (b‚Çô n)) :
  IntervalIntegrable f volume a b ‚àß
    Tendsto (fun n => intervalIntegral f (a‚Çô n) (b‚Çô n) volume) atTop (ùìù (intervalIntegral f a b volume)) := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Let f : [a,b] ‚Üí ‚Ñù be a bounded function, {a_n} and {b_n} sequences such that a < a_n < b_n < b for all n, with lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} a_n = a and lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} b_n = b. Suppose f is Riemann integrable on [a_n,b_n] for all n. Then f is Riemann integrable on [a,b] and ‚à´_a^b f = lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} ‚à´_{a_n}^{b_n} f. -/
theorem jirilebl_ra_ch_riemann_1152 {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {a b : ‚Ñù} (h_ab : a < b)
  {a‚Çô b‚Çô : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù}
  (h_seq : ‚àÄ n, a < a‚Çô n ‚àß a‚Çô n < b‚Çô n ‚àß b‚Çô n < b)
  (h_a : Filter.Tendsto a‚Çô Filter.atTop (ùìù a))
  (h_b : Filter.Tendsto b‚Çô Filter.atTop (ùìù b))
  (h_bdd : ‚àÉ M, ‚àÄ x, x ‚àà Set.Icc a b ‚Üí |f x| ‚â§ M)
  (h_int : ‚àÄ n, IntervalIntegrable f volume (a‚Çô n) (b‚Çô n)) :
  IntervalIntegrable f volume a b ‚àß
    Filter.Tendsto (fun n => intervalIntegral f (a‚Çô n) (b‚Çô n) volume) Filter.atTop (ùìù (intervalIntegral f a b volume)) := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Let f : [a,b] ‚Üí ‚Ñù be a bounded function, {a_n} and {b_n} sequences such that a < a_n < b_n < b for all n, with lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} a_n = a and lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} b_n = b. Suppose f is Riemann integrable on [a_n,b_n] for all n. Then f is Riemann integrable on [a,b] and ‚à´_a^b f = lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} ‚à´_{a_n}^{b_n} f. -/
theorem jirilebl_ra_ch_riemann_1152 {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {a b : ‚Ñù} (h_ab : a < b)
  {a‚Çô b‚Çô : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù}
  (h_seq : ‚àÄ n, a < a‚Çô n ‚àß a‚Çô n < b‚Çô n ‚àß b‚Çô n < b)
  (h_a : Filter.Tendsto (fun n => a‚Çô n) Filter.atTop (Filter.nhds a))
  (h_b : Filter.Tendsto (fun n => b‚Çô n) Filter.atTop (Filter.nhds b))
  (h_bdd : ‚àÉ M, ‚àÄ x, x ‚àà Set.Icc a b ‚Üí |f x| ‚â§ M)
  (h_int : ‚àÄ n, IntervalIntegrable f volume (a‚Çô n) (b‚Çô n)) :
  IntervalIntegrable f volume a b ‚àß
    Filter.Tendsto (fun n => intervalIntegral f (a‚Çô n) (b‚Çô n) volume) Filter.atTop (Filter.nhds (intervalIntegral f a b volume)) := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Let f : [a,b] ‚Üí ‚Ñù be a bounded function, {a_n} and {b_n} sequences such that a < a_n < b_n < b for all n, with lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} a_n = a and lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} b_n = b. Suppose f is Riemann integrable on [a_n,b_n] for all n. Then f is Riemann integrable on [a,b] and ‚à´_a^b f = lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} ‚à´_{a_n}^{b_n} f. -/
theorem jirilebl_ra_ch_riemann_1152 {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {a b : ‚Ñù} (h_ab : a < b)
  {a‚Çô b‚Çô : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù}
  (h_seq : ‚àÄ n, a < a‚Çô n ‚àß a‚Çô n < b‚Çô n ‚àß b‚Çô n < b)
  (h_a : Tendsto (fun n => a‚Çô n) Filter.atTop (nhds a))
  (h_b : Tendsto (fun n => b‚Çô n) Filter.atTop (nhds b))
  (h_bdd : ‚àÉ M, ‚àÄ x, x ‚àà Set.Icc a b ‚Üí |f x| ‚â§ M)
  (h_int : ‚àÄ n, IntervalIntegrable f volume (a‚Çô n) (b‚Çô n)) :
  IntervalIntegrable f volume a b ‚àß
    Tendsto (fun n => intervalIntegral f (a‚Çô n) (b‚Çô n) volume) Filter.atTop (nhds (intervalIntegral f a b volume)) := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Let f : [a,b] ‚Üí ‚Ñù be a bounded function, {a_n} and {b_n} sequences such that a < a_n < b_n < b for all n, with lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} a_n = a and lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} b_n = b. Suppose f is Riemann integrable on [a_n,b_n] for all n. Then f is Riemann integrable on [a,b] and ‚à´_a^b f = lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} ‚à´_{a_n}^{b_n} f. -/
theorem jirilebl_ra_ch_riemann_1152 {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {a b : ‚Ñù} (h_ab : a < b)
  {a‚Çô b‚Çô : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù}
  (h_seq : ‚àÄ n, a < a‚Çô n ‚àß a‚Çô n < b‚Çô n ‚àß b‚Çô n < b)
  (h_a : Filter.Tendsto a‚Çô Filter.atTop (Filter.nhds a))
  (h_b : Filter.Tendsto b‚Çô Filter.atTop (Filter.nhds b))
  (h_bdd : ‚àÉ M, ‚àÄ x, x ‚àà Set.Icc a b ‚Üí |f x| ‚â§ M)
  (h_int : ‚àÄ n, IntervalIntegrable f volume (a‚Çô n) (b‚Çô n)) :
  IntervalIntegrable f volume a b ‚àß
    Filter.Tendsto (fun n => intervalIntegral f (a‚Çô n) (b‚Çô n) volume) Filter.atTop (Filter.nhds (intervalIntegral f a b volume)) := by sorry

import Mathlib
open Filter

/-- Let f : [a,b] ‚Üí ‚Ñù be a bounded function, {a_n} and {b_n} sequences such that a < a_n < b_n < b for all n, with lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} a_n = a and lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} b_n = b. Suppose f is Riemann integrable on [a_n,b_n] for all n. Then f is Riemann integrable on [a,b] and ‚à´_a^b f = lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} ‚à´_{a_n}^{b_n} f. -/
theorem jirilebl_ra_ch_riemann_1152 {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {a b : ‚Ñù} (h_ab : a < b)
  (a‚Çô b‚Çô : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
  (h_seq : ‚àÄ n, a < a‚Çô n ‚àß a‚Çô n < b‚Çô n ‚àß b‚Çô n < b)
  (h_a : Tendsto a‚Çô atTop (nhds a))
  (h_b : Tendsto b‚Çô atTop (nhds b))
  (h_bdd : ‚àÉ M, ‚àÄ x ‚àà Set.Icc a b, |f x| ‚â§ M)
  (h_int : ‚àÄ n, IntervalIntegrable f volume (a‚Çô n) (b‚Çô n)) :
  IntervalIntegrable f volume a b ‚àß
    Tendsto (fun n => intervalIntegral f (a‚Çô n) (b‚Çô n) volume) atTop (nhds (intervalIntegral f a b volume)) := by sorry
